lines.text: Here's your grog. That'll be two quid.
[Woody is water-skiing on a piece of the sunken ship, with the Captain tied to a rope pulling him along and Rat swimming next to him]
That's the last time I'll ever shanghai a woodpecker!
That reminds me, Cap'n - how about me £5?
Okay, mates. Miami Beach, straight ahead!
[Woody laughs as the cartoon fades out]
